application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Conditions 16 (Part iii only - Contamination) and 17 (Imported Soil) for Phase 10 (as shown on the submitted Target Competition Phasing Plan) only of planning application reference 2102/APP/2018/4231 dated 04-10-2019 (Redevelopment of the site to provide three buildings ranging from 2 to 10 storeys in height delivering 331 residential units and 710 sq.m of ground floor commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1, D1 or D2), including the provision of private and communal amenity areas, child play space, car parking, secure cycle parking, refuse storage areas and other associated development).
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 16 (Part iii only - Contamination) and Condition 17 (Imported Soil) for Phase 10 only (as shown on the submitted Target Competition Phasing Plan) of planning application reference 2102/APP/2018/4231. Further details are required in order to fully discharge the condition, namely:-

(i) Further details which confirm whether or not there are requirements for further verification report/s concerning the demolition, remediation and earthworks operations undertaken across the entire site by Alpine Demolition Ltd in July 2020 (08639-HYD-XX-VR-RP-GE-4000) for phases 1-10, as identified on the Fairview New Homes Ltd Drawing; Titled: Chailey Industrial Estate Hayes; Ref: Target Competition Phasing Plan; dated: 08/04/2021.
